I was one of the few people who never got to play classics such as Half Life, Fallout or DOOM until recently, and I honestly never thought much about them. I knew that Half Life was critically acclaimed and formed the backbone for not only Half Life 2 (considered by many to be the greatest game released by Valve), but also its successors, and the wide scope of the company, allowing it to release anything from consoles, to VR headsets (and VR games, as we found out).

Without spoiling too much, you play as Gordon Freeman, a scientist who studied for a PhD in Theoretical Physics at the MIT. (In other words, super-duper smart guy). He works in a top-secret research facility that works on teleportation gear, and ways to connect to other hypothetical dimensions. These experiments worked, but - as it turns out - worked too well, and creatures from a different dimension come seeping through the facility. Your goal is not only to seal this rift, but to ultimately survive.

The game employs the use of puzzles, which for the most part are extremely straightforward. While there are lots of visual hints available, such as outright signs, you will most likely not need any. Use your intuition, in 9 out of 10 cases, it will be right. The shooting is pretty good, all things considered, though the AI can get annoying even on Normal difficulty. Somehow I still managed to get across though.
The graphics are poor by today's standards; they are very low-poly, but that does not stop the game from setting an atmosphere. If anything, I appreciate the color palletes used, and on today's computers, the game changes levels instantly. It's also a nice change of pace from modern games; whereas modern games can draw you in with their visuals, this game draws you in by making you imagine its potential - and boy it is huge. You needn't look further than Half Life: Alyx.

Overall, really enjoyed it. Can recommend. 8/10

игар топ

Cara que jogo incrível! Tem um monte de coisa antiquada com certeza, mas em questão de inovação, narrativa e design no gênero FPS supera até vários jogos modernos.

Ele tem a característica semelhante a outros jogos antigos da época de não "segurar sua mão", mas o design é tão bem feito que >90% dos desafios são super intuitivos e bem pensados, você naturalmente vai progredir e ganhando aquela tão desejada satisfação pra cada desafio superado. O jogo respeita bastante a inteligência do jogador, atributo exemplar em vídeo-games e não tão comum nos jogos hoje em dia. Em raros momentos achei a solução para avançar na narrativa meio arbitrária ou obscura, mas não chegou a atrapalhar muito a jogabilidade (por exemplo o chefão-final que eu demorei um bocado até entender como derrotar). Ter um quick-save e quick-load no jeito ali foi bem crucial pra ter uma experiência boa também, não pode ter medo de usar essa funcionalidade.

Eu já tinha jogado até a metade uns 8 anos atrás, mas finalmente tomei vergonha na cara pra terminar, e valeu muito a pena. Recomendo mais esta versão do que a Half-life: Source, a qual eu comecei jogando e, de fato levemente mais bonitinha, mas recheada de bugs nos primeiros 10 minutos de gameplay. Estou animado para jogar e re-jogar o resto da série, e pra todo mundo que curte bastante a mídia de jogos, o Half-Life é uma experiência essencial para se experimentar.

Очень даже неплохая игра, но у меня она не очень сильно завлекла из-за отсутствия русификатора и компаса который будет указывать куда идти, так как у меня постоянно возникала проблема "А что теперь делать?" и именно по этому я прошёл игру на одном дыхании. Игра отличная, содержит множество очень даже проработанных уровней, большой ассортимент оружия и противников, хоть NPC иногда и тупят, но выполняют свою роботу. Рекомендую!

Je to klasika, každý si to musí aspoň skúsiť. Hru som prvýkrát dohral na medium, nerobila mi tá obtiažnosť žiadne problémy až do finálneho bossa hry tam začalo byť dusno takže pre menej skúsených "hráčov" to možno by som doporučil easy mód, keď dohráte hlavnú kampaň tak zábava nekončí! Môžete si zahrať aj multiplayer, síce niektoré servery sú prázdné ale niektoré su aj plné hráčov len ich stačí pohľadať. A keď vás nebude baviť aj multiplayer tak na hru sú tisíce modov takže zábava nekončí. Osobne doporúčam tieto: Half-Life Caged a brutal Half-Life. Vyšli aj  2 samospustiteľné datadisky pre Half-Life a to sú Half-Life opossing force a Half-Life blue shift. Pre mňa má hra jasných 11/10

Grenade.

Легенда! Просто легенда! Все! Больше нечего скачать. Valve сочетает в этой игре все самое лучшее: шутер от 1-го лица, экшен, научную фантастику и в какой-то степени даже головоломки. Сюжет затягивает с первого запуска игры, все очень круто, хоть и текстуры несколько устаревшие, как-никак а игра была сделана ещё во времена первого квейка. Есть пара нюансов: Гордон иногда просто проваливается сквозь текстуры, а также искусственный интелект охранников ломается. А в целом игра даже сейчас выглядит вполне актуально.
Che possa piacere o no, è un caposaldo della storia videoludica. Da giocare almeno una volta nella vita.
